nodes.text: Insider is an article written by Morrie Mullins as a tie-in to the Living Force campaign. It was published on the Wizards of the Coast website on May 26, 2005 and took the form of a HoloNet poster warning that Sot-sirc was back in the Cularin system. It was shortly after Sot-sirc was last in the system that Len Markus discovered the Darkstaff and the system vanished from the galaxy for 10 years.
The article was followed by roleplaying statistics for Sot-sirc.
